bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names fu gan 腹疳 , abdominal gan -illness. Pathological Condition of a severe type of pi gan 脾疳 , spleen gan -illness, affecting children. The appearance of patients with an enlarged abdomen, narrow neck, and consumption of muscles and flesh as characteristic signs is reminiscent of a pin. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry zhi zhu 蜘蛛：療小兒大腹丁奚 , “It cures children suffering from pin-slave [condition] with an enlarged abdomen”.
